mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_rsv (room_no, customer_no, check_in_datetime, check_out_datetime, rsv_status, create_datetime, update_datetime) VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{customerNo}, #{checkInDatetime}, #{checkOutDatetime}, '예약완료', NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT r.room_no AS roomNo, r.room_name AS roomName, r.room_type AS roomType, r.room_capacity AS roomCapacity, r.price_per_night AS pricePerNight, r.room_desc AS roomDesc, r.create_datetime AS createDatetime, r.update_datetime AS updateDatetime, ri.file_name AS fileName FROM room_info r INNER JOIN room_img ri ON r.room_no = ri.room_no WHERE r.room_type = #{roomType}

SELECT r.rsv_no rsvNo, r.room_no roomNo, r.customer_no customerNo, r.check_in_datetime checkInDatetime, r.check_out_datetime checkOutDatetime, r.rsv_status rsvStatus, r.create_datetime createDatetime, r.update_datetime updateDatetime, ri.price_per_night pricePerNight, c.customer_name customerName FROM room_rsv r INNER JOIN room_info ri ON r.room_no = ri.room_no INNER JOIN customer c ON c.customer_no = r.customer_no WHERE 1=1
AND (c.customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%'))
ORDER BY r.check_in_datetime DESC
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

mapper.update: UPDATE room_info SET room_name = #{roomName}, room_type = #{roomType}, room_capacity = #{roomCapacity}, price_per_night = #{pricePerNight}, room_desc = #{roomDesc}, update_datetime = NOW() WHERE room_no = #{roomNo}
UPDATE room_img SET origin_file_name = #{originFileName}, file_name = #{fileName}, file_ext = #{fileExt}, file_type = #{fileType}, update_datetime = NOW() WHERE room_no = #{roomNo}
